entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Snow level lowering to 1200 metres this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 6:24 PM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near midnight then cloudy. Snow level 1200 metres lowering to near valley bottom in the evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 6:24 PM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023
